name: the shooting flyer
description:
hello, it's me again, leonardo, the 11 years old creator of the game.

this game is a shooter where you only need a mouse!

hold right to go in shoot mode (thrust does not work in shoot mode)

press left to shoot in shoot mode

use your mouse to aim (both flight mode and shoot mode)

shoot the enemies

dont touch enemies (and spikes)

get the hightest score possible!
